name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1.　　Circuit Variables
2.　　Circuit Elements and Kirchhoff’s Laws 
3.　　Simple Resistive Circuit Analysis 
4.　　Techniques of Circuit Analysis 
5.　　Capacitance and Inductance
6.　　Responses of First-Order RC and RL Circuits
7.　　Responses of RLC Circuits
8.　　Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis
9.　　Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
schedule:
Week 1: Course Overview
Week 2: Circuit Variables 
Week 3: Circuit Elements and Kirchhoff’s Laws
Week 4: Simple Resistive Circuit Analysis
Week 5: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Nodal Analysis
Week 6: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Mesh Analysis
Week 7: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Thevenin’s Theorem and Norton’s Theorem
Week 8: Techniques of Circuit Analysis: Maximum Power Transfer Theorem
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Capacitance and Inductance
Week 11: Natural Responses of RC and RL Circuits
Week 12: Step Responses of RC and RL Circuits
Week 13: Natural Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 14: Step Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 15: Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis: Phasors
Week 16: Sinusoidal Steady State Analysis: Circuit Analysis
Week 17: Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
Week 18: Final
materials:
課本: 
James Nilsson and Susan Riedel, Electric Circuits: 10th Edition, Pearson
